name: Myth Slayer 2D
description:
Myth slayer 2D is a Single player 2D side scroller

Buy Upgrades to make your character stronger

Evils awaits you to be destroyed at once

Enemies get stronger as you kill them

Rush through the never ending cave

The more enemies 

Note: This game contains ads

Please download 

 Android only

IOS and HTML5 coming soon
